DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write access to mailboxes via POP.
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via POP protocol.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
